# Online Image Shrinker — Full Site Documentation

> Free, privacy-first image tools that run entirely in your browser. No uploads, no accounts, no tracking.

## About

Online Image Shrinker is a suite of 20+ free image manipulation tools powered by WebAssembly and TensorFlow.js. Every tool processes images locally on the user's device — zero bytes are sent to any server. The site supports 6 languages (English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian) and works offline as a PWA.

## URL: https://onlineimageshrinker.com
## Sitemap: https://onlineimageshrinker.com/sitemap.xml

---

## Core Tools

### Image Compressor
- **URL:** /tool/compress
- **Purpose:** Reduce JPEG, PNG, WebP file sizes by up to 90%
- **Technology:** WebAssembly (browser-wasm)
- **Landing Pages:** /compress-jpeg, /compress-png, /compress-webp

### AI Background Remover
- **URL:** /tool/remove-bg
- **Purpose:** Remove backgrounds using browser-based ML
- **Technology:** @imgly/background-removal (ONNX model)
- **Landing Page:** /remove-background

### AI Image Upscaler
- **URL:** /tool/upscale
- **Purpose:** 2x/4x resolution enhancement via neural networks
- **Technology:** TensorFlow.js, ESRGAN model
- **Landing Page:** /ai-image-upscaler

### Image Converter
- **URL:** /tool/image-converter (internal)
- **Purpose:** Convert between JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC formats
- **Technology:** Canvas API, heic2any
- **Landing Pages:** /image-converter-online, /convert-heic-to-jpg, /convert-png-to-jpg, /convert-jpg-to-png, /convert-webp-to-png, /convert-webp-to-jpg, /convert-heic-to-png

### Crop & Resize
- **URL:** /tool/crop, /tool/resize
- **Purpose:** Presets for Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, Passport, print sizes
- **Landing Pages:** /resize-for-instagram, /resize-for-youtube, /resize-passport-photo, plus 20+ preset-specific pages

### Images to PDF
- **URL:** /tool/pdf
- **Purpose:** Merge multiple images into a single PDF
- **Technology:** jsPDF
- **Landing Pages:** /jpg-to-pdf, /compress-pdf-to-100kb through /compress-pdf-to-10mb

### Privacy Blur / Redactor
- **URL:** /tool/redact
- **Purpose:** Blur faces, text, and sensitive data
- **Landing Page:** /blur-image-online

### EXIF Metadata Remover
- **URL:** /tool/exif (internal)
- **Purpose:** Strip GPS coordinates and camera data
- **Technology:** exif-js library
- **Landing Page:** /exif-remover

### Screenshot Beautifier
- **URL:** /tool/screenshot-beautifier (internal)
- **Purpose:** Add backgrounds, frames, and shadows to screenshots
- **Landing Page:** /screenshot-beautifier

### Profile Picture Maker
- **URL:** /tool/profile-picture (internal)
- **Purpose:** AI background removal + custom styling for profile photos
- **Landing Page:** /profile-picture-maker

### Meme Generator
- **URL:** /tool/meme-generator (internal)
- **Purpose:** Classic top/bottom text meme creator with Impact font
- **Landing Page:** /meme-generator-online

### QR Code Generator
- **URL:** /qr-code-generator
- **Purpose:** Create QR codes from any URL or text with custom colors
- **Technology:** qrcode.react

### Instagram Grid Splitter
- **URL:** /tool/grid-splitter (internal)
- **Purpose:** Split images into 3x3 or 3x1 grids for Instagram profiles
- **Landing Page:** /instagram-grid-maker

### Photo Filters
- **URL:** /tool/photo-filters
- **Purpose:** Apply Instagram-style preset filters and adjust brightness, contrast, saturation
- **Landing Page:** /photo-filters-online

### Image Compare
- **URL:** /compare-images-online
- **Purpose:** Side-by-side slider, overlay, or split comparison of two images

### Social Media Preview Generator
- **URL:** /social-media-preview-generator
- **Purpose:** Create platform-ready OG images for Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn

### Collage Maker
- **URL:** /collage-maker
- **Purpose:** Combine multiple photos into grid layouts

### Video to GIF / Audio
- **URL:** /tool/video-to-gif, /tool/video-to-audio
- **Purpose:** Extract GIF or MP3 audio from MP4/MOV/WebM video files
- **Technology:** FFmpeg.wasm
- **Landing Pages:** /convert-mp4-to-gif, /convert-mov-to-gif, /convert-webm-to-gif, /convert-mp4-to-mp3, etc.

### Video Compressor
- **URL:** /tool/video-compressor
- **Purpose:** Compress video files locally in the browser
- **Technology:** FFmpeg.wasm

### OCR Text Extractor
- **URL:** /image-to-text
- **Purpose:** Extract text from images using Tesseract.js OCR engine

### Digital Signature Maker
- **URL:** /signature-maker
- **Purpose:** Draw and export signatures as transparent PNGs

### Batch Processor
- **Purpose:** Process multiple images at once for compression, resize, or conversion

### Color Palette Extractor
- **URL:** /color-palette-generator
- **Purpose:** Extract dominant colors and palettes from images with Hex/RGB codes
- **Technology:** ColorThief library

### Magic Eraser
- **URL:** /magic-eraser
- **Purpose:** Remove objects from photos using AI inpainting
- **Technology:** ONNX Runtime Web

### Watermark Tool
- **URL:** /watermark-photos-online
- **Purpose:** Add text and logo watermarks with customizable fonts, colors, and opacity

---

## Solutions & Industry Hubs

### For Real Estate Agents
- **URL:** /solutions/for-realtors
- **Purpose:** Optimize property photos for MLS & Zillow listings

### For E-commerce Sellers
- **URL:** /solutions/for-ecommerce
- **Purpose:** Prepare product photos for Shopify, Etsy & Amazon

---

## Blog Content

The blog covers 35+ articles on image editing, formatting, and privacy topics:
- Image compression guides (JPEG, PNG, WebP comparison)
- Social media size guides (Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, Discord)
- Passport photo tutorials (US, UK, EU)
- E-commerce image requirements (Amazon, Shopify, Etsy)
- Privacy and security articles
- Tool-specific how-to guides

**Blog URL:** /blog

---

## Privacy Model

All processing uses client-side technologies:
- WebAssembly (WASM) for compression and format conversion
- TensorFlow.js and ONNX Runtime for AI features
- Canvas API for image manipulation
- FFmpeg.wasm for video processing
- No server-side processing, no data collection, no accounts required
- Cookie consent banner for optional analytics
- Full privacy policy at /privacy

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend:** React 19 + Vite
- **Routing:** react-router-dom v7 (SPA)
- **i18n:** i18next (en, es, de, fr, pt, it)
- **PWA:** vite-plugin-pwa with offline support
- **Hosting:** Vercel (static)
- **Analytics:** Google Analytics 4 (opt-in via cookie consent)

## Structured Data
- WebApplication schema on all tool pages
- BlogPosting schema on all blog articles
- FAQPage schema on pages with FAQ sections
- HowTo schema on tutorial/landing pages
- BreadcrumbList schema on all pages
- Organization schema with publisher info
